snippet: A rift between Gov. Jan Brewer and state legislators in her own party over her support of Medicaid expansion played out before the State Supreme Court on Thursday.
abstract: Rift between Arizona Gov Jan Brewer and state legislators in her own party over her support of Medicaid expansion reaches Arizona State Supreme Court, where Brewer asks justices to uphold lower court ruling that stopped suit charging expansion effort is unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: A rift between Gov. Jan Brewer and state legislators in her own party over her support of Medicaid expansion played out before the State Supreme Court on Thursday.

headline.main: Arizona: Court Hears Arguments Over Medicaid
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Court Hears Arguments Over Medicaid
